title.rendered: L Catterton invests in Maria Nila Holding AB

content.rendered:
L Catterton, a leading global consumer-focused investment firm, has acquired a significant minority stake in the Swedish haircare brand Maria Nila through an acquisition of shares in Maria Nila Holding AB.

Maria Nila was founded back in 1999 and is today a well-known brand with an extensive line of sustainable, certified cruelty-free and 100% vegan haircare, styling, and treatment products. The brand is widely recognized for its products’ performance and unique designs and has been rewarded with several international beauty and consumer awards. By partnering with L Catterton, Maria Nila aims to accelerate its growth even further by expanding the brand, product portfolio and sales channels on a global level.

L Catterton was advised by Mannheimer Swartling in the transaction, which closed on 23 August 2023.
